author: Justine Coleman
title: Birx says first country in pandemic has 'higher moral obligation' for transparency after Trump criticism of WHO response
description: Deborah Birx, the White House coronavirus task force coordinator, said Sunday that the first country struck by a pandemic has a "higher moral obligation" for communication and transparency.ABC's ...
content:
Deborah Birx, the White House coronavirus task force coordinator, said Sunday that the first country struck by a pandemic has a higher moral obligation for communication and transparency.
